Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: NEW KINGDOM (not after); MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before)
Name: Dish
Description: Dish with a flat base, flared, and with a thinned vertical lip. The common clay, relatively coarse (organic temper) and buff-coloured, is flaky. The object has been polished, though throwing marks are still very visible, especially on the inside.
